meanings.sent1: The typist quickly typed up the report for her boss.
meanings.sent2: The typist used a keyboard to type out the important document.
meanings.sent3: The typist accidentally typed the wrong letter and had to start over.
meanings.sent4: She was a typist, turning thoughts into words with each tap of the keys.
meanings.sent5: The typist's fingers danced across the keyboard, creating a symphony of words.

meanings.definition: One who operates a typewriter or keyboard.
meanings.sent1: The skilled typist effortlessly operated the typewriter in the office.
meanings.sent2: As a typist, he was responsible for maintaining the typewriter in good condition.
meanings.sent3: The typist playfully pretended the keyboard was a piano, typing out a melody.
meanings.sent4: She was a typist, composing stories with the keys as her instruments.
meanings.sent5: The typist's fingers flew across the keyboard, bringing words to life on the screen.
